title: QuickTabsManager closeById/closeAll API
details:
**Bug Pattern:** Non-existent method called on QuickTabsManager

**Root Cause:** Code in content.js was calling `quickTabsManager.closeQuickTab(id)` which does not exist.

**Actual Available Methods (QuickTabsManager):**
- `closeById(id)` - Close a single Quick Tab by ID (delegates to destroyHandler.closeById)
- `closeAll()` - Close all Quick Tabs (delegates to destroyHandler.closeAll)

**Fix Applied:**
1. For clearing all Quick Tabs: Use `closeAll()` directly instead of looping with individual calls
2. For closing single Quick Tab: Use `closeById(id)` instead of non-existent `closeQuickTab(id)`

**Files Affected:**
- `src/content.js` - Message handlers for CLEAR_ALL_QUICK_TABS and test bridge handlers

**Prevention:** Always check `src/features/quick-tabs/index.js` for actual available public methods on QuickTabsManager class before using them.
